sentences.en: Crises were symptoms of deeper problems which if allowed to fester would prove increasingly unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 危机只是更深刻的问题的表面症候,这些问题如果任其发展,就会变得越来越难驾驭.

sentences.en: Her only worry was Herb , who had become more unmanageable than ever since the squatting.
sentences.cn: 唯一叫她操心的就是赫伯,自从占居的事情发生以后, 他更加不听话了.

sentences.en: If your hair is dry, frizzy unmanageable, maybe it's just hungry!
sentences.cn: 如果您的发丝干燥鬈缩,很难梳理, 可能是因为它们需要营养大餐了!

sentences.en: Parents may find that a troublesome teenager becomes unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 父母会发现令人头疼的青少年变得难以管教。

sentences.en: People were visiting the house every day, sometimes in unmanageable numbers.
sentences.cn: 每天都有人来参观那栋房子，有时人多得都无法控制。

sentences.en: Recent experience suggests, as Kaufman foresaw, that are opaque, unmanageable and riddled with conflicts of interest.
sentences.cn: 我们近期获到的经验表明, 正如考夫曼所预见的那样, 这些机构不够透明 、 难以管理、内部充满利益冲突.

sentences.en: She became so unmanageable, she was committed to an asylum.
sentences.cn: 她变得如此不可理喻, 被送进精神病院.

sentences.en: Such a list would be unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 这样的清单将是庞大的.

sentences.en: The bureaucracy nominally under his control is huge and probably unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 名义上归他领导的那个官僚机构,庞大而且有些无法控制.

sentences.en: The concept of a continuous spectrum is obviously unmanageable graphically.
sentences.cn: 连续谱的概念显然用图形无法表达.

sentences.en: The rabble soon grew violent and unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 暴民们很快地变得狂暴和无法控制.

sentences.en: The signs are that indulged children tend to become unmanageable when they reach their teens.
sentences.cn: 这些迹象表明被宠坏的孩子在十几岁的时候往往会变得难以管教。

sentences.en: This made him more defiant and unmanageable than ever.
sentences.cn: 这使他比以往更加不听话和难以对付.

sentences.en: Unmanageable complexity can result in massive foul - ups or spectacular budget " run always. "
sentences.cn: 这种失控的复杂性会造成大量的故障或惊人的预算 “ 失控 ”.

sentences.en: You must go through your mailbox once a week, or it will become unmanageable.
sentences.cn: 你的信箱必须每周清理一次, 否则会变得无法管理.

words.tran_cn: 难处理的，处理不了的；难管理的；难操纵的

trans.tran_cn: 难管理的，难处理的，难操纵的，处理不了的
trans.tran_en: difficult to control or deal with
